    OR

== Step 1. WSP Installation ==
  # You can [Installation install] all the webparts with our step by step installation guide.

  # Please note the code from previous step. Now you need to add the web part on the page from Web Part gallery <br/> http://sharepoint-twitter.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/webpart-write-pane.PNG

  # Once configured you will be able to tweet for this user <br/> http://sharepoint-twitter.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/webpart-write-demo.png
